D

d_cardsOwned - Variable in class entities.Player
This hashmap stores the number of cards owned in key value format where key is name of card and value is number of cards available to the player.
d_gameEngine - Variable in class controller.state.Phase
This is the object of GameEngine class.
d_gameEngine - Variable in class controller.UserCommand
This is the object of GameEngine class.
d_isConquered - Variable in class entities.Player
This boolean stores if the country is conquered or not by the player.
d_logEntryBuffer - Variable in class controller.GameEngine
This is is LogEntryBuffer Object to write all the logs in the log file.
d_negotiatedPlayerNames - Variable in class entities.Player
This array list stores the name of players for which diplomacy card is used for negotiation.
d_neutralPlayer - Variable in class controller.GameEngine
This is the object of Neutral Player.
d_orders - Variable in class entities.Player
This Queue stores the object of type Orders for each Player to be executed in FIFO pattern later.
d_playerName - Variable in class controller.GameEngine
This arraylist stores names of all the players present in the game.
d_players - Variable in class controller.GameEngine
This hash map stores the player name with respective player in key value pair, key represents Player Name and value represents Player object.
d_playersOrder - Variable in class controller.GameEngine
This queue stores all the available player in the Game.
d_random - Variable in class controller.GameEngine
This is the random object which can be used by all the class.
d_strategy - Variable in class entities.Player
This is the type of Strategy that the player possess.
d_userCommand - Variable in class controller.GameEngine
This is the UserCommand Object.
